name: BattleGrid Champions
description:
BattleGrid Champions

Preview Download

Build a powerful deck and Champion strategy
Draft your Champion team against your opponent
Battle your Champions to defeat all of your opponents Notes:
  • Game requires 2 players to play at this time, so grab a friend and dive in!
  • Windows/Linux/Mac support now
  • Note: that the Linux and Mac support are very new
  • - for Mac users you may have to force open the app
  • 1920x1080p resolution - as not all the UI is scaled and ready for different screens
  • - if you do not run the game in this resolution it should work but may not look good
  • Most computers should be able to run the game, most of the heavy lifting is in the server
